title: BRIEF-Glaxosmithkline Pharmaceuticals Recalls Zinetac Tablets Manufactured In India
text:
BRIEF-Glaxosmithkline Pharmaceuticals Recalls Zinetac Tablets Manufactured In India

Stock Markets 12 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 19:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Glaxosmithkline Pharmaceuticals Recalls Zinetac Tablets Manufactured In India Sept 25 (Reuters) - GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceuticals Ltd : * CONTACTED BY REGULATORY AUTHORITIES ABOUT DETECTION OF NDMA IN RANITIDINE PRODUCTS * SUSPENDS DISTRIBUTION OF ALL DOSE FORMS OF RANITIDINE HYDROCHLORIDE PRODUCTS TO ALL MARKETS * SUSPENSION AS A PRECAUTIONARY ACTION PENDING OUTCOME OF ONGOING TESTS AND INVESTIGATIONS * INITIATES VOLUNTARY RECALL OF ZINETAC TABLETS 150 MG AND 300 MG PRODUCTS MANUFACTURED IN INDIA * PRODUCT MANUFACTURED USING API FROM SMS LIFESCIENCES INDIA REMAIN ON HOLD, WILL NOT BE RELEASED WHILE CO AWAITS TEST RESULTS

BRIEF-Glaxosmithkline Pharmaceuticals Recalls Zinetac Tablets Manufactured In India
description: BRIEF-Glaxosmithkline Pharmaceuticals Recalls Zinetac Tablets Manufactured In India
